channel.title: Cracked Win7?
channel.description:
Well, my sisters have been begging me to 'fix' their shitty slow computer, and I was just going to a fresh install of win7, thing is, I do not have and blank disk(s) to copy a iso file or anything like that on to & I have no re-installation disks.
I was wondering if there was like a download of windows 7 that was a runnable in .exe or something of that nature, thank's!

item.title: Cracked Win7?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:44, topic:418137”]I don’t want to go through all that hassle though.
I have a win7 torrent downloading, I’m going to use Virtual clone drive to install it.[/quote] do what soul suggested

go to piratebay -> type windows 7 - > click SE -> its the first link

download that and use frostwire

download poweriso

you can then install it through your other windows. didn’t take long maybe about 5 hours.

item.title: Cracked Win7?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:42, topic:418137”][quote author=vexx1345 link=topic=520685.msg3783798#msg3783798 date=1318697102]

Well, my sisters have been begging me to ‘fix’ their shitty slow computer, and I was just going to a fresh install of win7, thing is, I do not have and blank disk(s) to copy a iso file or anything like that on to & I have no re-installation disks.

I was wondering if there was like a download of windows 7 that was a runnable in .exe or something of that nature, thank’s!

if you want to fix their “shitty, slow computer” get Ubuntu at Ubuntu.com.
[/quote]

No, I have Ubuntu, but I’m not going to go through all the hassle of getting them used to it & what they can and cannot do on it, etc… They’re only 9 & 7 an simple windows7 OS is what they’re used to.[/quote]You can do anything on Ubuntu

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Loveandpower:

Am I able to do updates with the cracked version you told me to download on piratebay or do I have to keep it off?

When first installing the OS, keep the updates off. Then when it’s installed and stuff, it should start installing all the updates and what not.

item.title: Cracked Win7?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower

I was wondering if there was like a download of windows 7 that was a runnable in .exe or something of that nature, thank’s!

if you want to fix their “shitty, slow computer” get Ubuntu at Ubuntu.com.
[/quote]^ this lol

Update: Just dual installed windows 7 it isn’t too bad but I got a feeling after I add stuff on here it won’t be going very fast. At the moment it’s peaking about 30% my xp did about 25% so it isn’t too bad. I still prefer xp interfaces

It’s helped my computer and sped up my computer by a lot in my opinion.[/quote]Am I able to do updates with the cracked version you told me to download on piratebay or do I have to keep it off?

item.title: Cracked Win7?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:29, topic:418137”]Here is a few pictures:

After typing Windows 7, follow these pictures, and click the first link after clicking SE.


You can use Frostwire, that’s what I use, if there is something better, go for it and use it.

P.S. - I would recommend downloading PowerISO to make the extraction easier, and won’t have to extract three damn ZIP folders.[/quote]Oh thanks soul I’m blind as hell

downloading frostwire now and I will do my first ever torrent download ^.^

item.title: Cracked Win7?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Here is a few pictures:

After typing Windows 7, follow these pictures, and click the first link after clicking SE.


You can use Frostwire, that’s what I use, if there is something better, go for it and use it.

P.S. - I would recommend downloading PowerISO to make the extraction easier, and won’t have to extract three damn ZIP folders.

Read full topic

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:25, topic:418137”]ThePirateBay > Windows 7 > Click SE > Download first link > When asking to install the X84 or X64 do X84 instead of the other option (choose whether you want ultimate or not etc., you’ll see what I mean when there) and wahla.[/quote]I don’t see a SE ?

okay I never worked with torrents xD I got this torrent file from the piratebay thingy how do I open the torrent file o.0

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

jmood128:

rofl both of my computers that I installed a cracked Windows 7 ultimate on need to be reactivated after a year in use. So I just used RemoveWAT.

Yeah, that’s what I’ve done when it happens again and works like a CHARM.

item.title: Cracked Win7?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

ThePirateBay > Windows 7 > Click SE > Download first link > When asking to install the X84 or X64 do X84 instead of the other option (choose whether you want ultimate or not etc., you’ll see what I mean when there) and wahla.

item.title: Cracked Win7?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

if u want a direct installation, then find the win7 iso, and just mount it to your drive using poweriso… or magiciso… there are a ton of these around… and yeah, then it will just run it as if there were a cd in there.

Read full topic
